name: After-equipping-and-recruiting
desc: Alex goes back to the castle and Vicanti sends him off on his mission.

pages.name: Start
pages.text:
Alex returns to the castle after visiting the blacksmith. Upon returning to the throne room, Alex sees that the guild chief is just leaving. The chief walks past Alex with a grin on his face. Whatever business he was here for must've been a success.

Alex enters the throne room to see {o.Alex.g@his2} father with the same grin.

"Welcome back, my {o.Alex.g@son}. You came at the perfect time. We will have a feast tonight to send you off on your journey in the best possible way!"

Alex returns to {o.Alex.g@his2} room and waits for dinnertime.

pages.name: In room
pages.text: Dinner is ready, so Alex goes to the dining room.

pages.name: Dining Room
pages.text: After eating, Alex goes back to {o.Alex.g@his2} room and goes to bed early.

pages.name: Wake up
pages.text: Alex wakes up early, eagerly awaiting {o.Alex.g@his2} journey! After saying goodbye to {o.Alex.g@his2} father, Alex is on {o.Alex.g@his2} way!
